pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/openmsistream) ![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/license/openmsi/openmsistream) ![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/openmsistream) ![GitHub Release Date](https://img.shields.io/github/release-date/openmsi/openmsistream) ![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/openmsi/openmsistream) ![CircleCI](https://img.shields.io/circleci/build/github/openmsi/openmsistream/main) [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/openmsistream/badge/?version=latest)](https://openmsistream.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest) [![linting: pylint](https://img.shields.io/badge/linting-pylint-yellowgreen)](https://github.com/PyCQA/pylint)Applications for laboratory, analysis, and computational materials data streaming using [Apache Kafka](https://kafka.apache.org/)Available on PyPI at https://pypi.org/project/openmsistream and GitHub at https://github.com/openmsi/openmsistream Official documentation at https://openmsistream.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Developed for Open MSI (NSF DMREF award #1921959)
